javolver

Class Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • javolver.Chromosome

  • public class Chromosome
extends java.lang.Object
    Chromosome is a simple list of double values (0..1), that supports some general functionality. Values will be mapped to the required data ranges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor.
